snippet.title: Blasphemous 2 -  Official Release Date Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2023
snippet.description:
Blasphemous 2, the sequel to the critically acclaimed 2D soulslike from developer The Game Kitchen, gets a new gameplay trailer and release date. As one might expect from the series, the trailer shows off some really horrid creatures, a bunch of awesome execution animations, and some absolutely beautiful cartoon cutscenes. Players can return to the unsettling world of Blasphemous on August 24, 2023 on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
